column4: Hi there, I have been looking at the ubuntuguide but i can't seem to find anything about setting up sound, I get this error when I try to play a music file with xmms, can anyone help?
** WARNING **: oss_open(): Failed to open audio device (/dev/dsp): No such file or directory
I was wondering how to set up my sound? I am completely new to linux.
do you have the ubuntu sound at startup (gnome) ?
No mixer elements and/or devices found.
ouch! your sound card wasn't detected
do you know which sound card is on your system ?
you can put the new option in "nonaltoptions=.." so you can keep it when upgrading the kernel
Do I put it in both places so?
no need, you have to type "sudo update-grub"
